name: Toe-tastic Taco Pie
description:
Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse - Attack
  • Right Mouse - Look in player direction
Description:

A second person adventure set in a future world where death by starwation is nothing out of the ordinary. The Toe-tastic Taco Pie Company produces taco pies. Recently the gates to the pie factory was closed and protests began.

Made by:

Harald Thorsson and Kazz

This game was made during the Brakeys Game Jam 2023.1 by:

https://paddegroda.itch.io and https://kapoter1447.itch.io
